options: title; text; textbox; image; video; audio; interactive
description: What type of slide is this? This will determine which fields are evaluated and how the slide will function and look.
The text in this field will get an <h1> emphasis if the slide_type is set to title, or and <h2> emphasis if any other type.
The text in this field will get an <h2> emphasis if the slide_type is set to title, or and <h3> emphasis if any other type.
This will be a byline when slide_type is title. Otherwise, it will be treated as a source line or credit line.
This field will be evaluated differently for each slide_type. HTML is permitted.
URL of the image you wish to use or a hex color.

This field will only be evaluated if background is an image, not a color. If no value is entered, the background image will be full brightness. Value of 50 will result in a 50% black fade. 25 will result in a 75% fade. 75 will result in a 25% fade.

This field will only accept a URL. DO NOT INSERT ANY <IFRAME> OR <SCRIPT> TAGS IN HERE! If slide_type is set to video, this field will expect a youtube url. If slide_type set to audio, will expect soundcloud url. If slide_type set to interactive, will expect the url of a pym embed.
If you are using a pym embed, please include an ID that identifies this pym interactive. If you have more than one pym embed in a single project, make sure that each pym_id is different
